title: Make More Art
description: One of the first pieces I made in cathodemer, more of a practice piece than anything.

title: INVASIVE THOUGHTS
description: Made from my own MRI brain scan. Are they invasive thoughts, or invasive watchers...?

title: DIGITAL NIGHTMARES
description: Digital nightmares...When will the synaptic cascade stop?

title: The Gargoyle
description: This gargoyle sits stoic and ever present within my room. It watches over my dreams, and keeps me safe.

title: Ilu <3
description: I love you <3 What a pure phrase.

title: SYSTEM HALTED
description: When your ticker stops, you can't press any key to continue...

title: The Running Man
description: Caught in endless purgatory, he runs because to stop is to accept death

title: The smiler
description: He knows something you don't. Can't you tell by that smug grin?

title: Bouncin Poss!
description: Lookit me bounce! this is an art piece from frostyfiend, given as a gift for helping them find a crack for their animation software

title: I Bite!
description: Drawn by my friend Lupin. Beware, I toooootally bite!

title: Kernel Panic
description: KERNEL PANIC! Comission from an artist on Fiverr, makes for a great icon

title: Sona Fashion Ref
description: Different clothes my sona would wear!

title: Sona Ref
description: My sona ref! look how adorable I am!

title: Flower Field
description: Lost in a wonderfield field of flowers...I could stay here forever...

title: Possum Silvia
description: So I say to myself I gotta find this guy. I gotta go up to his office, I gotta put his mail in the guy's goddamn hands! Otherwise he's never gonna get it, it's gonna keep coming back down here. So I go up to Pepe's office and what do I find out, Mac, what do I find out? There is no Pepe Silvia. The man does not exist, okay? So I decided, ohh shit, buddy, I gotta dig a little deeper. There's no Pepe Silvia, you gotta be kidding me, I got boxes full of Pepe!

title: SCREAMFEST
description: GO HARD OR GET FUCKED LOSER!

title: Guess I'll die!
description: Welp, guess I'll die!

title: Plotting...
description: Aha! I was expecting you to click this picture....I have a proposition for you!

title: Peep Da Glasses
description: Round glasses rock, love how they look w/ my face. behold my wonderful gasmask, that I wore through most of the pandemic!

title: West side!
description: West side 4 life!

title: 3D Scan
description: A 3D Scan of me I created using instant-NeRF, a neural network that creates primitives based off only a handful of images

title: Fractured Caesar
description: Made in blender, more of a practice piece. Still like how it came out though. Ceasars assasination if it was vaporwave lmao

title: Poss Render
description: My first character made in 3D! Gotta do more with it...I am an infinite procrastinator

title: Hookah
description: A Hookah I made in blender, my only reference being a random photo I found off google. First model I made completely by hand on my own. I was very proud!

title: Herbert 'The Snail' The Worm
description: This is Herbert 'The Snail' The Worm! He is a creation of my sister who I decided to 3d model. Would you sit and enjoy a cup of tea with this lonely viator?

title: Common Catastrophe
description: Painted in VR. Just another common catastrophe

title: Lilac Bridge
description: The halfway point. The demarcation between here and there. My landmark. My bridge.

title: Reflective Sea
description: Painted in VR, simulating oil paint. Quite proud of how this one came out

title: Grassy Sands
description: Painted in VR, simulating oil paint. Almost alien.

title: Snowy Night
description: Painted in VR, simulating oil painting. Made while watching bob ross, not too proud of this one but it's a piece nonetheless

title: Copepod, lightfield
description: Copepod plankton, shot with lightfield on my microscope. The one plankton from spongebob is based off of. Note the red cycloptic eye

title: Diatom
description: A widdle itty bitty diatom shell. Made of silica. Pretty cool!

title: Plankton Nauplii
description: This guy was born on the slide! There's also Vorticella, except it's mobile and hasn't attached to anything yet.

title: Plankton Covered In Vorticella
description: A Copepod covered with Vorticella Convallaria! they're filter feeders, and just hanging on for a free ride and free food. Not what I would call Symbiotic!

title: KP Radio Promo
description: KPradio.net, for all your listening pleasures...

title: Before the Mask
description: A test render, trying to define an older CGI style.
